channel.title: JavaScriptKit.com
channel.description: JavaScript tutorials and over 400+ free scripts!

item.title: Document Text Resizer
item.description: This script adds the ability for your users to toggle your webpage's font size, with persistent cookies then used to remember the setting

item.title: JavaScript Reference- Keyboard/ Mouse Buttons Events
item.description: The latest update to our JS Reference takes a hard look at keyboard and mouse button events in JavaScript, including the unicode value of each key.

item.title: Dynamically loading an external JavaScript or CSS file
item.description: External JavaScript or CSS files do not always have to be synchronously loaded as part of the page, but dynamically as well. In this tutorial, see how.
